Mountains

Photos from the Canadian Rockies

The way I see it mountains are the best subject matter for landscape photographs. They embody the rugged outdoors lifestyle and take the viewer back to a time before modernization, to a place of refuge and discovery, full of tangible forms that rekindle our close connectedness with nature and the outdoors.
